messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM ANDREW TURNER
messages.content:
Dear Island Resident,

As you read this letter, you have taken a positive step to ensure your voice is heard...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Need to move from an economy built on debt to an economy that saves and invests for the future.
Advocating for smaller Government that delivers needs and promises more wisely than any civil servants.

issues.economy: The election will have strong influence on how to deal with the nation's debts and get the economy back on its feet.
issues.governance: We need smaller Government that recognises that you spend your money better than any civil servants.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have a proven track record of speaking up for the Island's needs, as well as helping individual Islanders with their problems.

politicalExperience.achievements: Speaking up for the Island's needs and helping individual Islanders with their problems.

images.caption: Andrew Turner in various settings, including meeting with David Cameron and engaging with constituents.
